column2: There are two key facets to data transformation: **justification** and **documentation**.  Whenever data are transformed, you must provide a good reason for doing so (hint: there are many good reasons and also a few bad ones). Furthermore, **you must adequately document "how" and "why" the data were transformed**, so that others can understand your work and reproduce your results if needed.
